strapiPost.title: Crystal Bridges Hosts Northwest Arkansas Fashion Week
strapiPost.photoCredit: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art
strapiPost.content:
Northwest Arkansas Fashion Week, presented by INTERFORM, will culminate in a one-day event at Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art this Saturday, Nov 12. 

  • Talk the talk: Designers from the EMERGE Designer Residency program and museum scholars will lead public presentations and panel discussions in the Great Hall and on Walker Landing from 1-4p on Saturday. 
  • Walk the walk: In the evening, models will strike signature poses and strut their stuff down the catwalk during exclusive ticketed runway shows, and there will be an immersive VIP Experience in the Great Hall.

Get your tickets for the runway show HERE.
